Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka aims to complete a series sweep after winning the first two matches.
The West Indies will be looking to avoid a whitewash and regain momentum.
The match will feature the debut of all-rounder Chamindu Wickramasinghe.
Others: The match is scheduled for October 26, 2024, at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Sri Lanka.
The match will start at 2:00 PM local time.
